long_description: Combining the feminine coverage of a skirt with the supportive performance of capris, the Marmot Lateral Capri Skirt keeps you comfortable on trail runs with its lightweight, stretchy fabric. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric helps protects skin from damaging sunlight with a UPF factor of 30. Gusset of capris features a quick-drying, highly breathable CoolMax(R) polyester fabric patch. Flatlock seams enhance comfort, and elastic drawcord waist dials in the fit. An interior pocket stores a key, and a pocket on leg of capris stores small accessories. Reflective logos increase visibility in dim light. The women's Marmot Lateral Capri Skirt features a 12.5 in. outer skirt length and a 19 in. liner capri inseam.
short_description: Combining the feminine coverage of a skirt with the supportive performance of capris, the Marmot Lateral Capri Skirt keeps you comfortable on trail runs with its lightweight, stretchy fabric.
